question.text: Which of the following assisted reproductive technique is used to cure infertility due to very low sperm count in the ejaculates?

options.text: Both <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Infertility is either due to inability of the male partner to inseminate the female, or due to very low sperm counts in the ejaculates. This can be corrected by artificial insemination (AI) called intra-vaginal insemination or intra-uterine insemination (IUI).
